trans-unit.source: The section describes how to implement automation with the <token>azureauto_1</token> API.
trans-unit.target: The section describes how to implement automation with the <token>azureauto_1</token> API.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Automation service provides a highly reliable and scalable workflow execution engine to automate frequently repeated management tasks.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Automation service provides a highly reliable and scalable workflow execution engine to automate frequently repeated management tasks.

trans-unit.source: The processes are automated through runbooks, which are PowerShell Workflows run in the Azure Automation execution engine.
trans-unit.target: The processes are automated through runbooks, which are PowerShell Workflows run in the Azure Automation execution engine.

trans-unit.source: You can use this API to create, update, read, and delete automation resources, including runbooks and runbook jobs.
trans-unit.target: You can use this API to create, update, read, and delete automation resources, including runbooks and runbook jobs.

trans-unit.source: In addition you can manage assets such as variables, schedules, PowerShell modules, credentials, and certificates.
trans-unit.target: In addition you can manage assets such as variables, schedules, PowerShell modules, credentials, and certificates.

trans-unit.source: You can automate the following resources.
trans-unit.target: You can automate the following resources.

trans-unit.source: Each resource contains specific tasks for that resource.
trans-unit.target: Each resource contains specific tasks for that resource.
